snippet: Billy Hurley III shot a three-under-par 67 to take a two-stroke lead over Ángel Cabrera after the third round of the Greenbrier Classic in White Sulphur Springs, W.Va.
abstract: Billy Hurley takes third-round lead at Greenbrier Classic golf tournament; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Billy Hurley III shot a three-under-par 67 to take a two-stroke lead over Ángel Cabrera after the third round of the Greenbrier Classic in White Sulphur Springs, W.Va.

headline.main: Hurley Widens Lead at Greenbrier Classic
headline.print_headline: Hurley Widens Lead at Greenbrier Classic
